title: Riot, is this your idea of perma-bannable behavior in 2018?
body:
Edit: here is a link the match history of said game <removed by moderation>

TL;DR skip to comms that got me **PERMANENTLY BANNED**  Second and third paragraph explains context of comms:

Never in my life have I been banned from a game until I played League of Legends.  Nonstop trolls, some days you mute them, some days you leave comms open in case you need to communicate something important but God forbid you annoy a troll whatsoever or tell them you will report them or you are BANNED.  

I received a fourteen-day ban five months ago on my alternate account "PraiseChrist" (Username: Godisamazing1011) for telling off some trolls in an obnoxious and aggressive way.  I took my punishment in stride.  Decided to take a couple months break to cool off as my account was level 27, excited to have another fresh MMR'ed level 30, but I was in a place where I was going up against smurf after smurf + seemingly, people who got their alts banned on my team so they want to harass me for things like my name. 

 Anyway, I got back from my hiatus, played like fifteen games over the course of three days when I entered a game where as ADC my Soraka support decided it be funny (for seemingly NO reason RIGHT from the start) to simply not heal me one time.  As in, stand there by the turret AFK with full health and mana whilst I try and adc.  Soon after that a duo of Taliyah and Ekko begin feeding and trolling and then starts trolling us in the surrender vote (myself and Vi, the only other serious player were trying to surrender and move on) telling us and others that I'm voting no, so a lighthearted blame game of sort ensues.  So one hell of a troll match, as per usual but here are the comms that got me permanently banned:

Game 1
In-Game
PraiseChrist: heal me?

PraiseChrist: why the fuck would iv ote no

PraiseChrist: BRO just cause it aint ekko

PraiseChrist: math
PraiseChrist: taliyah since you are qued with him can you ask him why he is inting?
PraiseChrist: aint no practice jsut cancer
PraiseChrist: take your buddy through some bot games
PraiseChrist: thank youf or finally telling your friend he is inting
PraiseChrist: mb panth ulted me
PraiseChrist: they gave up going top
PraiseChrist: just voted yes
PraiseChrist: who hasnt voted
PraiseChrist: soraka vote yes
PraiseChrist: how do we know it snot you?
PraiseChrist: who was the one who said we were going to practice?
PraiseChrist: cause thats who isnt voting
PraiseChrist: oh
PraiseChrist: damn irelia your feeding!
PraiseChrist: now i knwo taliyah is lying cause i voted right after first one
PraiseChrist: well then ekko then
PraiseChrist: because id int read lol?
PraiseChrist: nice excuse
PraiseChrist: please dont report me vi i havent done anything wrong
PraiseChrist: i didnt bring in an inter
PraiseChrist: i got my lane trolled
PraiseChrist: im literally doing nothing
PraiseChrist: its over now :)
PraiseChrist: i could have done better vi im sorry
Post-Game
PraiseChrist: honored vi
PraiseChrist: i think sorak and ekko were in the same lobby
PraiseChrist: with taliyah?
PraiseChrist: i didnt report you soraka
PraiseChrist: but the rest of the team did
PraiseChrist: i didnt say roam map and troll buddy
PraiseChrist: sorry
PraiseChrist: i said work solo
PraiseChrist: while i fight without her heals
PraiseChrist: clueless


Now it's worth mentioning that there were two other games listed in this PERMANENT SUSPENSION report from games I was ALREADY BANNED for months ago in which I was genuinely being a twat and just downright trolling chat.  (Wasn't being racist, homophobic, or saying anything really that BAD to people; was just being extremely immature and saying mostly dirty stuff.and I was rightfully banned for those games I suppose?)  But this was the only report I got after returning and apparently THIS was the straw that broke the camels back and justified a PERMANENT SUSPENSION of my hard earned account?  

Tell me something guys.  Why does Riot care more about how players use their comms in this game than how people play it?  Guarantee that Soraka troll is never going to be banned, but God forbid someone like me get on and decide to tell someone who is trolling me they are muted and GL standing around AFK while I solo it... now THAT'S an example of the  00.1% toxic player base.

I'll be submitting a ticket soon.  Thank you for allowing me to vent.  I AM NOT A CROOK
